instructions: **List all** the files from the **current directory** including the hidden ones
Now **list all** the files inside the project, recursively (all files in the hierarchy).
**Go** to the last level below the **small-name** folder and **write** in the console the content of *the trophy.txt* file.
**Move** up and get to the **funcode** directory and **list all** files with the javascript typical extension.
**Create a copy** of the last file you can find within **/boringfolder/** childs (**the-mostboring-text.txt**) and **name** it **myfistcopy.txt**.
**Print** in the command line the content of **the-ultimate-joke.txt**.
**Remove** all the contents form the **boringfolder**, the are extremly boring.
**Open** the file kamehameha/dragon-ball-jokes.md using the **VI command line text editor**
**Update** the file kamehameha/dragon-ball-jokes.md, **remove** the first joke, **save and close** the text editor.
